title: I gotta say tho that AHri skin tho
body:
I was really shock when I saw it hit the SS@20 news...  at first I thought it looked like eve but wow Ahri?.. after 12 months later she got a new skin? its strange tbh..   hmm i wonder how much it would cost Im guessing around 750-1350

P.S. The other Ahri hate thread skin is a troll and a joke :P its just fun seeing ppls reaction
